title: AWS DevOps Engineer Professional Certification Preparation
description: Prepare for the AWS Certified DevOps Engineer exam with these courses and practice exam.

title: AWS Data Engineer Associate Certification Preparation
description: This module provides a targeted pathway to prepare for the AWS Certified Data Engineer – Associate certification (DEA-C01).

title: AWS Solutions Architect Certification Preparation
description: This module prepares you for the AWS Certified Solutions Architect – Associate (SAA‑C03) certification.

title: AWS AI Practioner Certification Preparation
description: This module guides learners through the core concepts and AWS services needed for the AWS Certified AI Practitioner (AIF-C01) certification.

title: AWS Generative AI Developer Certification Preparation
description: This module prepares experienced cloud developers and technical leads for the AWS Certified Generative AI Developer – Professional (AIP-C01) exam.

title: Generative AI Fundamentals for Developers
description: Master transformers, diffusion models, and why they matter in everyday coding.

title: Introduction to AI powered IDEs
description: AI-assisted navigation, inline chat, context windows for large codebases.

title: Introduction to Prompt Engineering
description: Prompt engineering bootcamp: design prompts, strategies, evaluations, integrated into SDLC.

title: Generative AI in AWS
description: Build Generative AI Systems with AWS: An Introduction to Bedrock, AgentCore, SageMaker and more

title: Introduction to Retrieval-Augmented Generation
description: RAG training: design, build, evaluate systems; apply patterns, labs, deployment.

title: Model Context Protocol (MCP)
description: MCP Deep Dive, workflows, and secure integration for AI agents.

title: Agentic AI and workflow
description: Build Agentic AI system, multi-agent orchestration, and autonomous task execution

title: Introduction to LLM Engineering
description: Learn LLM production engineering: ingestion, retrieval, orchestration, evaluation, monitoring, and safety in scalable systems.
